dcterms:description: DMLab-30 is a benchmark consisting of 30 diverse pixel-based environments designed for training reinforcement learning agents. It facilitates the emergence of complex behaviors through multi-task training.
dcterms:title: DMLab-30

dcterms:creator: M. Kempka
M. Wydmuch
G. Runc
J. Toczek
W. Jaskowski
dcterms:description: VizDoom is a Doom-based AI research platform that provides challenging scenarios for visual reinforcement learning, allowing agents to learn from high-dimensional pixel observations.
dcterms:title: VizDoom

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Atari Learning Environment is a collection of 2D pixel-based arcade games designed as an evaluation platform for general agents in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Atari Learning Environment

dcterms:description: Pre-generated environment layouts for DMLab-30, which contain a sufficient number of unique environments for extensive training without the need for dynamic generation during training.
dcterms:title: DMLab-30 (pre-generated environment layouts)
